title: Thank you for making Veigars ult look like his Q
body: Now Yasuo wont know when to windwall it anymore.

replies.body:
I know this is non-serious, but it’s still pretty easy to distinguish between the two.

Just see if it’s homing in on you or not.
The other consideration that the preview videos I've seen haven't highlighted: Veigar's Ult gets bigger with more AP. If it looks the same size as a Q, it probably hurts as much as a Q.

In melee range it won't matter. No yas is going to react fast enough to windwall either a q or an ult at melee range. He will ult preemptively if anything. In melee range it's even easier to tell actually. Did it pass through you? Well it was his Q. Did it hit you and stop? It was his ult.

> In melee range it won't matter. No yas is going to react fast enough to windwall

Hahaha lemme just stop you there. (Most) Targeted projectiles don't deal damage until they reach the center of a champion's position. So it's actually fairly easy to wind wall it even in melee range since wind wall will poof it so long as it hasn't dealt damage yet (assuming max melee range and not like, model touching range).
